did.unittitle: United Hatters, Cap and Millinery Workers International Union Files on Microfilm
did.abstract: Microfilmed copies of the records of the United Hatters Union.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: In 1934 the United Hatters of North America and the Cloth Hat, Cap and Millinery Workers International Union merged, forming the United Hatters, Cap and Millinery Workers International Union (UHCMW). For 50 years the UHCMW organized the hat and millinery trade in the United States, until they merged with the Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers Union (ACTWU) in 1983. The ACTWU merged in 1995 with the International Ladies' Garmernt Workers' Union to form UNITE (Union of Needletrades, Industrial an dTextile Employees).

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Reels 1 and 4 of this collection are negative copies of reels 2 and 3. They are housed separately in collecion #6399 mf. They are available upon request.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: United Hatters, Cap and Millinery Workers International Union Files on Microfilm #5755 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: /4212: Kheel Center Current Documents Correspondence 5012: Saul Wallen Papers 5192: Paul Abelson Papers 5221: Max Meyer Papers 5344: Walter Gordon Merritt Papers 5541: Philip Taft Papers 5609: Philip Ross Collection of NLRB Documents 5619/001: ACTWU Collective Bargaining Agreements 5619/020: ACTWU Subject Files 5619/030: ACTWU General Executive Board (GEB) Files 5619/036: ACTWU President's Office Murray Finley Files 5663 mf: Collective Bargaining Agreements on Microfilm 5755 mf: United Hatters, Cap and Millinery Workers International Union Files on Microfilm 5780/002: ILGWU David Dubinsky Correspondence 5780/022: ILGWU Local 62 Correspondence 6030: Archival Collective Bargaining Agreements File 6036/001: Elias Lieberman Manuscripts 6046: Archives Union File (AUF) 6118 AV: Kheel Center AV Collection 6178/002: BLS Collection of Collective Bargaining Agreements (Part 2) 6178/013: BLS Collection of Collective Bargaining Agreements (Part 13) 6178/014: BLS Collection of Collective Bargaining Agreements (Part 14) 6333 MB: Rita Addessa Collection of ACTWU Memorabilia 6342 OHT: "Twentieth Century Trade Union Women: Vehicle for Social Change" Oral History Transcripts 6343 MB: Leonard Greenwald Collection of ACTWU and UNITE Memorabilia 6367 AV: Darlene Forte' Collection of United Hatters, Cap and Millinery Workers Union Audio-Visual Material
